message.content: cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI. The paper focuses on finding good answers in a community forum using semantic similarity features based on fine-tuned word embeddings and topics similarities. This falls under the categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and social and information networks (cs.SI).
